author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 20-year-old tusker was found dead in forest near Poondi on Thursday.

Forest Department officials, who rushed to the spot following information from villagers, said that the animal had died two days ago and the injuries in the body suggested that the animal could have been killed in a fight with another tusker.

The elephant had suffered injuries in its abdomen and its intestine was out. It had injuries also on its head and fore legs.
title: Tusker found dead
